page.title: 18Pratts Bottom,Bromley,S.E.
page.content: Most people find Pratts Bottom small and comfortable.THere are lots of clubs to go to.Most of them are in the Village Hall,which is conveniently situated in the middle of Pratts Bottom. At the bottom of Rushmore Hill there is a pottery shop for some souvenirs.Most of the houses are big and spacious and there is hardly any traffic.This makes it easy to play and ride bikes without getting run over. The shops are nearby but they do not sell a wide variety of things.There are stinging nettles everywhere.You have to walk to most places.There are a lot of flints and sharp stones.If you are trying to dig you will find a lot of chalk so it is difficult to do gardening in Pratts Bottom.
